    • Method Detail

      • notifyOwner

        public void notifyOwner(String message,
               Object data)
        Sends a notification to the app owner. This method is useful for debugging purposes.
        Parameters:
        data - Some other useful data that will be converted to JSON
        message - A textual note

      • notifyUser

        public void notifyUser(String message)
        Sends a notification to the app user. This method is useful for debugging purposes.
        Parameters:
        message - A textual note

      • config

        public void config(Any conf)
        Sets the configuration parameters.
        Internal use only

      • config

        public String config(String key)
        Retrieve a configuration parameter. Anything can be stored in the configuration but everything will be string. The easyest way to get complex data is therefore to deal with JSON.
        Parameters:
        key - The configuration key name or null to retreive all configuration parameters
        Returns:
        The value matching the provided key in string format, or an associative array of all key-value pairs if no key is provided, or null if no configuration matches the provided key
        Internal use only
        used to set the original config by passing the config array as argument

      • config

        public Any config()
        Retrieve a configuration parameter. Anything can be stored in the configuration but everything will be string. The easyest way to get complex data is therefore to deal with JSON.
        Returns:
        A map of all configuration parameters
        Internal use only
        used to set the original config by passing the config array as argument

      • locale

        public String locale()
        Retrieve the preferred user language.
        Returns:
        The 2 letter language code

      • id

        public String id()
        Retreive the unique ID of this app instance. The id will always be the same for a given app instance and will always be different between instances of the same app.
        Returns:
        The unique ID

      • name

        public String name()
        Retreive the user-given name of this app instance. This may be useful to display information such that the user recognizes his instance.
        Returns:
        The app name
